SEO.title: Industry Info, News & Tips
SEO.description: Check our blog for the latest updates and news from the world of blockchain, AI, VR, IoT, software and app development.

data.title: How to Revolutionize Retail With Computer Vision
data.baseline: Fascinating computer vision applications are shaping the new digital retail industry. Planning, analyzing customer behavior, attracting new customers,  and managing products in stock have now been made much easier and more efficient.

data.title: AIRA: A State-of-the-Art AI-Powered Tool for Retina Analysis and Disease Diagnosis
data.baseline: In the modern age of technology, there are still people who lack access to state-of-the-art medical diagnosis and treatment. AIRA brings them a step closer to providing reliable and cost-effective ophthalmological care to the masses.

data.title: Self Driving Cars Disrupting the Future of Transportation
data.baseline: Self-driving cars promise to be an efficient and sustainable mode of transportation for everyone, preventing accidents and making commuting convenient for all. Hardware and especially AI software development is what’s driving the industry forward.

data.title: Why Building a Chatbot for Your Business Is Something You Should Consider
data.baseline: Messenger chatbots have become a proven marketing tool across a variety of industries. Businesses that have not jumped on the bandwagon are missing a piece of the pie.

data.title: How to Improve Digital Retail & E-Grocery With Robots
data.baseline: Time is ripe to bring about change for online retail. As more goods are being sold online, retail businesses around the world are turning to robots to help them service their customers reliably and cost-effectively.

data.title: Top Artificial Intelligence (AI) Development Companies
data.baseline: The success of modern software products lies in the hands of AI development companies as we are crossing into an age when most processes can be easily automated or simplified. Not having your project powered by AI development may lead to losses and additional expenses. Ultimately, it all comes down to your choice of the right team for the job.

data.title: Let's Build AI Future Together — The Age of Quantum Enlightenment
data.baseline: The future of AI technology sees humanity probing for space exploration, quantum wave function calculation, and countless unprecedented innovations in a variety of fields and industries. As engineers of the artificial intelligence future, how far can we go?

data.title: Let's Start the Future of Artificial Intelligence Now
data.baseline: With the whirl and pressure of releasing new technology and innovating just about everything, artificial intelligence (AI) might be almost unrecognizable in the future.
